channel.title: CVE Feed for Mozilla -- Thunderbird
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mozilla -- Thunderbird

item.title: CVE-2024-8394|2024-09-06T19:40:31.668Z -- mozilla -- thunderbird
item.description: When aborting the verification of an OTR chat session, an attacker could have caused a use-after-free bug leading to a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 128.2.

item.description: When aborting the verification of an OTR chat session, an attacker could have caused a use-after-free bug leading to a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 128.2.
